tasks.label: Build SFML App (Sequential Nash) Linux
tasks.command: mkdir -p bin && g++ -g src/main.cpp src/Geometry.cpp src/MovingObstacle.cpp src/SequentialNashSolver.cpp -o bin/app_sequential -Iinclude -I/usr/include/SFML -L/usr/lib -lsfml-graphics -lsfml-window -lsfml-system -std=c++17 -Wall -O2
tasks.detail: Builds the SFML application with sequential Nash solver for Linux
